703224f-a.text:
Bergen Street, at the northwest corner of Schenectady Avenue, showing Public School No. 83. This is the Dean Street side of the school.

Board of Education of the City of New York. March 6, 1931
703224f-a.folder: Bergen Street & Schenectady Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703225f-a.text:
Bergen Street, at the northwest corner of Schenectady Avenue, showing Public School No. 83. The school fronts also on Dean Street.

Board of Education of the City of New York March 6,1931
703225f-a.folder: Bergen Street & Schenectady Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
